mapper.select: select c1.comment_idx as c_idx, c1.i_idx, c1.m_idx, c1.comment, date_format(c1.post_date, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i") as post_date, c2.count_sub from COMMENT c1 left outer join (select comment_idx2, count(*) count_sub from COMMENT group by comment_idx2) c2 on c1.comment_idx = c2.comment_idx2 where c1.i_idx = #{i_idx} and c1.comment_idx2 is NULL
select comment_idx as c_idx, i_idx, m_idx, comment, date_format(post_date, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i") as post_date, comment_idx2 as c_idx2 from COMMENT where comment_idx2 = ${c_idx}
mapper.update: update COMMENT set comment = '(삭제된 댓글)', m_idx = '0' where comment_idx = #{c_idx}
